CustomField.formula: (CASE(litify_pm__Status__c, 'Lead Generated', 1, 'Intake Scheduled', 2, 'In Contact/Under Review', 3, 'Missed Appointment', 4, 'Intake Package Sent', 5, 'Attempting to Contact', 6, 'Questionnaire', 7, 99) * 10) + CASE(Case_Type_Reporting__c, 'Labor Law', 1, 'MVA', 2, 'Premises', 3, 'WC & PI', 4, 'Personal Injury', 5, 'Worker Compensation', 6, 'Other', 7, 8)
CustomField.label: Priority Score
